review: It's cool, but I don't use it as much as I thought I would. The ultimate test was casting a movie from my laptop onto the TV—it did seem to slow down quite a bit, and the audio was never quite in sync with the video. I suppose this could be the fault of my network, and not Chromecast itself. Certainly for showing static web pages and photos on the television, this is a great tool.
